org.cloudbus.cloudsim

Class CloudletScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.CloudletScheduler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CloudletSchedulerSpaceShared, CloudletSchedulerTimeShared, NetworkCloudletSpaceSharedScheduler

    public abstract class CloudletScheduler
extends Object
    CloudletScheduler is an abstract class that represents the policy of scheduling performed by a virtual machine. So, classes extending this must execute Cloudlets. Also, the interface for cloudlet management is also implemented in this class.
    Since:
    CloudSim Toolkit 1.0
    Author:
    Rodrigo N. Calheiros, Anton Beloglazov

    • Constructor Summary

      CloudletScheduler()
      Creates a new CloudletScheduler object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CloudletScheduler

        public CloudletScheduler()
        Creates a new CloudletScheduler object. This method must be invoked before starting the actual simulation.

    • Method Detail

      • updateVmProcessing

        public abstract double updateVmProcessing(double currentTime,
                        List<Double> mipsShare)
        Updates the processing of cloudlets running under management of this scheduler.
        Parameters:
        currentTime - current simulation time
        mipsShare - array with MIPS share of each processor available to the scheduler
        Returns:
        time predicted completion time of the earliest finishing cloudlet, or 0 if there is no next events

      • cloudletSubmit

        public abstract double cloudletSubmit(Cloudlet gl,
                    double fileTransferTime)
        Receives an cloudlet to be executed in the VM managed by this scheduler.
        Parameters:
        gl - the submited cloudlet
        fileTransferTime - time required to move the required files from the SAN to the VM
        Returns:
        expected finish time of this cloudlet, or 0 if it is in a waiting queue

      • cloudletSubmit

        public abstract double cloudletSubmit(Cloudlet gl)
        Receives an cloudlet to be executed in the VM managed by this scheduler.
        Parameters:
        gl - the submited cloudlet
        Returns:
        expected finish time of this cloudlet, or 0 if it is in a waiting queue

      • cloudletCancel

        public abstract Cloudlet cloudletCancel(int clId)
        Cancels execution of a cloudlet.
        Parameters:
        clId - ID of the cloudlet being cancealed
        Returns:
        the canceled cloudlet, $null if not found

      • cloudletPause

        public abstract boolean cloudletPause(int clId)
        Pauses execution of a cloudlet.
        Parameters:
        clId - ID of the cloudlet being paused
        Returns:
        $true if cloudlet paused, $false otherwise

      • cloudletResume

        public abstract double cloudletResume(int clId)
        Resumes execution of a paused cloudlet.
        Parameters:
        clId - ID of the cloudlet being resumed
        Returns:
        expected finish time of the cloudlet, 0.0 if queued

      • cloudletFinish

        public abstract void cloudletFinish(ResCloudlet rcl)
        Processes a finished cloudlet.
        Parameters:

      • getCloudletStatus

        public abstract int getCloudletStatus(int clId)
        Gets the status of a cloudlet.
        Parameters:
        clId - ID of the cloudlet
        Returns:
        status of the cloudlet, -1 if cloudlet not found

      • isFinishedCloudlets

        public abstract boolean isFinishedCloudlets()
        Informs about completion of some cloudlet in the VM managed by this scheduler.
        Returns:
        $true if there is at least one finished cloudlet; $false otherwise

      • getNextFinishedCloudlet

        public abstract Cloudlet getNextFinishedCloudlet()

        Returns:
        a finished cloudlet

      • runningCloudlets

        public abstract int runningCloudlets()
        Returns the number of cloudlets runnning in the virtual machine.
        Returns:
        number of cloudlets runnning

      • migrateCloudlet

        public abstract Cloudlet migrateCloudlet()
        Returns one cloudlet to migrate to another vm.
        Returns:
        one running cloudlet
